short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every week we dive deep into different business opportunities and explain how to pounce on them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join us each week on the My First Million (MFM) Podcast to kickstart your entrepreneurial journey. Delve deep into the realm of business as we uncover the most lucrative opportunities and reveal the strategies to harness them for success.â€¨

Accompany industry leaders Sam Parr and Shaan Puri as they decode the latest market trends and present ripe opportunities ready for the taking. With MFM expert analysis and insightful guidance, you'll gain an edge in the ever-evolving business landscape.

Get ready for invigorating brainstorming sessions featuring esteemed guests such as Austin Rief from Morning Brew, Morgan Housel from The Collaborative Fund, and trailblazing venture capitalists like Jess Mah.
